channel.title: thinking on Rizwan Hasan
channel.description: Recent content in thinking on Rizwan Hasan

item.title: Philosophy of Losers
item.description: Losers never give up on giving excuses because they have a strong belief in themselves that they can’t do it. It’s your beliefs that make you the winner or loser in the first place.

item.title: Why do people don't want to spend alone moments?
item.description: People don’t want to spend alone moments. Most of the time when they get a feel of getting alone, they try to engage with things like listening to songs, watching movies, etc. Have you ever tried to observe the reason of this? A very simple reason they will give you that spending time without doing anything is boring. Yes, doing nothing is boring but this is not the right brick to fit in this puzzle.
